name: xowl-client
author: OXE development team

sections.description: This WordPress plugin adds to your default editor (TinyMCE) the ability to detect semantic entities on your post content and link them to their official wikipedia page for further reading.
sections.installation:
1. Unzip and upload wp-xowl-client folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Edit and enhance your posts’ content by clicking on the new button on the TinyMCE’s toolbar.
sections.changelog:
1.Clean empty spaces when storing input variables. 1.Removing entities from the enriched post. 1.Review stored variables and its name. 1.Make a global submit button on the settings form. 1.Fixing minor errors.

1.0

  • First release. It allows user enrich post content adding semantic link to dbpedia.

short_description: This plugin improves the default TinyMCE editor to recognize entities on all the user's posts.
description: This WordPress plugin adds to your default editor (TinyMCE) the ability to detect semantic entities on your post content and link them to their official wikipedia page for further reading.
